original_text: If thou shalt hearken unto the voice of the Lord thy God, to keep his commandments and his statutes which are written in this book of the law, and if thou turn unto the Lord thy God with all thine heart, and with all thy soul.
korean_text: 네가 네 하나님 여호와의 말씀을 청종하여 이 율법책에 기록된 그의 명령과 규례를 지키고 네 마음을 다하며 뜻을 다하여 여호와 네 하나님께 돌아오면

sentences.original_text: If thou shalt hearken unto the voice of the Lord thy God
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 네 하나님 여호와의 목소리를 청종하면

sentences.original_text: to keep his commandments and his statutes
which are written in this book of the law
and if thou turn unto the Lord thy God
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만일 네가 네 하나님 여호와께로 돌아와

sentences.original_text: with all thine heart, and with all thy soul
sentences.korean_translation: 네 마음을 다하고, 네 성품을 다하면
